snippet.title: R-Type Dimensions Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out official page on Facebook, too!
http://www.facebook.com/pages/R-Type-Dimensions/70891397328

The coin-op classics, R-Type & R-Type II, are together at last! Fight through all 14 Bydo-infested stages in original 2D or all-new 3D graphics  and swap back and forth on-the-fly. The classic game-play remains untouched, and a new Infinite game mode allows continuous progression from the game start to the final boss the Bydo will not evade you this time! Both game modes can be played as single player or multiplayer missions, either locally or over Xbox LIVE. Pull yourself together, save the earth and strike down the evil Bydo Empire!!
